To view your portfolio performance on the desktop website, follow these steps:
1. Log in to your Ndax account.
2. On your Dashboard, scroll down to the Portfolio Distribution section.
3. Here, you'll see a summary of your portfolio, including total value and asset distribution.
4. To view more details, click SEE ALL.

What you'll find on the detailed portfolio page (after clicking SEE ALL):
Top-level portfolio metrics, including:
- Portfolio Value
- Staking Value
- Total Invested
- Total Withdrawals
- Total Profit
- Portfolio Growth %
Graphical breakdowns, including:
- A distribution chart showing your total balance and allocation across assets.
- A balance or performance graph over selectable timeframes (7D, 1M, etc.).
- Option to toggle between Balances and Performance.
Asset table, which displays:
- Your balance per crypto asset
- Purchase price and current market price
- Unrealized gains/losses
- Share of each asset in your total portfolio
- Quick access to Trade or enable Auto-Buy
